content.query:
IF  EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.objects WHERE object_id = OBJECT_ID(N'[Fact].[UserPC]') AND type in (N'U'))
DROP TABLE [Fact].[UserPC];

CREATE TABLE [Fact].[UserPC]
  (  
  ID              INT IDENTITY(1,1) NOT NULL,
  UserID          INT NULL,
  PaymentCardID   BIGINT NULL,
  IsCreated       BIT NULL,
  CreateDate      DATETIME NULL,
  ProcessDate     DATETIME NULL
  )  
WITH
(
	DISTRIBUTION = ROUND_ROBIN,
	CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
)
GO
